name: Devolution Spray
rules: Devolve 1 of your evolved Pokémon and put the highest Stage Evolution card on it into your hand. (That Pokémon can't evolve this turn.)
You may play any number of Item cards during your turn.

name: Giant Cape
rules: The Pokémon this card is attached to gets +20 HP.

name: Rescue Scarf
rules: If the Pokémon this card is attached to is Knocked Out by damage from an attack, put that Pokémon into your hand. (Discard all cards attached to that Pokémon.)

name: Tool Scrapper
rules: Choose up to 2 Pokémon Tool cards attached to Pokémon in play (yours or your opponent's) and discard them.
You may play any number of Item cards during your turn.

name: Blend Energy GRPD
rules: This card provides Colorless Energy. When this card is attached to a Pokémon, this card provides Grass, Fire, Psychic, or Darkness Energy but provides only 1 Energy at a time.

name: Blend Energy WLFM
rules: This card provides Colorless Energy. When this card is attached to a Pokémon, this card provides Water, Lightning, Fighting, or Metal Energy but provides only 1 Energy at a time.
